Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

RoomItem.Name: rug adorned with pandas and cats
RoomItem.Description: A throw rug with embroidery of cats and pandas on it.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

RoomItem.Name: cool rock
RoomItem.Description: A rock you thought looked neat at the time, but you now realize looks just like all of the other rocks around here.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

RoomItem.Name: DVD set of "The Matrix" series
RoomItem.Description: This is the entire DVD box set of "The Matrix" series. Probably one of, if not the best, movie franchises to exist.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

RoomItem.Name: ginormous statue of Malphite that's bigger than all of the broken chairs and computers in the CMB building combined
RoomItem.Description: I... how did you get this in your inventory? I am speechless. Your powers are beyond my understanding.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

RoomItem.Name: golden goose egg
RoomItem.Description: A solid gold egg laid by a goose (you assume). This is probably worth some good money.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

RoomItem.Name: tibetian ritual dagger
RoomItem.Description: A bronze dagger presumably used in rituals. Appears to be of Tibetian origin. Looks like an item in a video game that you would have one line of dialogue for, stick into a hole in a wall once, and then never come up in the story ever again.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

RoomItem.Name: golden ring
RoomItem.Description: This ring seems to have otherworldly powers surrounding it. When you touch it, you can almost hear a whisper in your ear in a language that you can't understand. You could also swear that you saw some form of written script appear on it, but there's nothing there now.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south.

RoomItem.Name: alien device
RoomItem.Description: This device is alien to you and you can't seem to shake the feeling that it's not from this world. You're reminded of a quote: "Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the universe, or we are not. Either option is equally terrifying." -Arthur C. Clarke
